objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Mystery/Detective lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to education and learning in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about education and learning using formal register
Students create original mystery themed content about education and learning in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using formal register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in formal register within mystery theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
